description: Template to help link this website to mobile apps. Replace placeholders before publishing.
notes: For Android: publish a JSON like the 'android' entry at '/.well-known/assetlinks.json' (exact filename and location required). For iOS: create an 'apple-app-site-association' file at the site root or '/.well-known/' (no file extension) and serve with Content-Type 'application/json'. Replace package names, team IDs, and SHA256 fingerprints with your app's real values before deploying.
